posts.post_content:
The recent Tolstoi postings made me take a look at my collection and I found a Ganzel. I've owned him since 1980 or earlier.  Clean, has a nice gloss, no creases. Just some sort of dirt or something.

Looks like PSA has graded 2, SGC, 3.

$1800ppd.  Please see high res images below (600dpi) and pm if interested. 

Thank you, 

peter

ETA: Added a photo from my cell phone to show the color is more vibrant than the scans.  (Not loving my new Epson v600).
I'm open to offers.  Thank you.  -peter
